channel.title: Hezbollah Rocket Launchers: Most Innacurate on the Planet?
channel.description: To the south, Hezbollah stepped up its assault on Israel, firing its highest daily tally of salvos yet, 215 rockets, killing a civilian and wounding seven others, according to the IDF.

item.title: Hezbollah Rocket Launchers: Most Innacurate on the Planet?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

plan: cover all iraqis in white ash and cover allbrits in mud, no more friendly fire problems just america fighting alot more efficiently

Read full topic

item.title: Hezbollah Rocket Launchers: Most Innacurate on the Planet?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“DagleovGY, post:5, topic:7560”]Two second i’ll just find the site it was on. Was a long while back though, you american or brit?

Cannot find but basically in Iraq an American jet blew up a British tank in friendly fire. They are some inaccurate rockets tbh. :P[/quote]

The americans also dropped a bomb from a plane, and killed 4 Canadians. They aimed it for there Military base, because they thought it was somehting to do with Iraq or something… I think thats a little worse. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.description:
@SaveSomeFace wrote:

Haha yes… possibly the most inaccurate on the planet with a daily tally of 215 “rockets” fired and only 1 fatality. :rolleyes:

They’d probably be more successful at throwing rocks.
